targets.queryText: SELECT SUM(amount/100.0) from v_transactions where substr(date, 1, 4)<="$year";
targets.rawQueryText: SELECT SUM(amount/100.0) from v_transactions where substr(date, 1, 4)<="$year";

targets.queryText: select MIN(SUM(amount/100.0)/50000*100,100) as "€50k", MIN(SUM(amount/100.0)/100000*100,100) as "€100k", MIN(SUM(amount/100.0)/250000*100,100) as "€250k", MIN(SUM(amount/100.0)/500000*100,100) as "€500k" from v_transactions where substr(date, 1, 4)<="$year";
targets.rawQueryText: select MIN(SUM(amount/100.0)/50000*100,100) as "€50k", MIN(SUM(amount/100.0)/100000*100,100) as "€100k", MIN(SUM(amount/100.0)/250000*100,100) as "€250k", MIN(SUM(amount/100.0)/500000*100,100) as "€500k" from v_transactions where substr(date, 1, 4)<="$year";

targets.queryText:
SELECT 
    substr('JanFebMarAprMayJunJulAugSepOctNovDec', 1 + 3*substr(date, 5, 2), -3) || ' ' || substr(date, 3, 2) as Datum,
    (SELECT -SUM(amount/100.0) from v_transactions t2 where substr(t2.date, 1, 6)=substr(t1.date, 1, 6) and category='5314f2dc-6129-4d47-a973-244a178fcffd') as Lebensmittelkauf,
    (SELECT -SUM(amount/100.0) from v_transactions t2 where substr(t2.date, 1, 6)=substr(t1.date, 1, 6) and category='c8114bc7-9944-4b96-838d-d9e46796e7c0') as Bestellen
FROM v_transactions t1
WHERE substr(date, 1, 4)="$year"
GROUP BY Datum
ORDER BY date;
targets.rawQueryText:
SELECT 
    substr('JanFebMarAprMayJunJulAugSepOctNovDec', 1 + 3*substr(date, 5, 2), -3) || ' ' || substr(date, 3, 2) as Datum,
    (SELECT -SUM(amount/100.0) from v_transactions t2 where substr(t2.date, 1, 6)=substr(t1.date, 1, 6) and category='5314f2dc-6129-4d47-a973-244a178fcffd') as Lebensmittelkauf,
    (SELECT -SUM(amount/100.0) from v_transactions t2 where substr(t2.date, 1, 6)=substr(t1.date, 1, 6) and category='c8114bc7-9944-4b96-838d-d9e46796e7c0') as Bestellen
FROM v_transactions t1
WHERE substr(date, 1, 4)="$year"
GROUP BY Datum
ORDER BY date;

targets.queryText: select 10500-SUM(amount/100.0) as Offen,SUM(amount/100.0) as Getilgt from v_transactions where account='8ce34628-6c31-4315-80bd-3fe4eef050d7' and category='f89fe60f-c0da-4015-b031-ccfd76255ccd' and substr(date, 1, 4)="$year";
targets.rawQueryText: select 10500-SUM(amount/100.0) as Offen,SUM(amount/100.0) as Getilgt from v_transactions where account='8ce34628-6c31-4315-80bd-3fe4eef050d7' and category='f89fe60f-c0da-4015-b031-ccfd76255ccd' and substr(date, 1, 4)="$year";

targets.queryText:
SELECT
    v_categories.name as category,
    -sum(v_transactions.amount/100.0)  as amount
FROM 
    v_transactions
JOIN 
    v_categories 
ON 
    v_transactions.category = v_categories.id
WHERE account='485a9e8d-1476-4d31-b9c0-193443dc9978' AND is_income=0 AND category != '182c3391-7cb6-46a6-b382-0c58952bd354' AND category != '5d31f7ee-0b38-47f5-bbe0-416d8d468a60' AND substr(date, 1, 4)="$year"
group by category
ORDER BY amount desc;
targets.rawQueryText:
SELECT
    v_categories.name as category,
    -sum(v_transactions.amount/100.0)  as amount
FROM 
    v_transactions
JOIN 
    v_categories 
ON 
    v_transactions.category = v_categories.id
WHERE account='485a9e8d-1476-4d31-b9c0-193443dc9978' AND is_income=0 AND category != '182c3391-7cb6-46a6-b382-0c58952bd354' AND category != '5d31f7ee-0b38-47f5-bbe0-416d8d468a60' AND substr(date, 1, 4)="$year"
group by category
ORDER BY amount desc;

targets.queryText:
SELECT
    v_categories.name as category,
    -sum(v_transactions.amount/100.0)  as amount
FROM 
    v_transactions
JOIN 
    v_categories 
ON 
    v_transactions.category = v_categories.id
WHERE account='46746a7c-0eff-4702-a081-5cef893afce9' AND is_income=0 AND category != '182c3391-7cb6-46a6-b382-0c58952bd354' AND category != 'cf607948-1034-412a-8a21-72a9dc761c5f' AND amount < 0 AND substr(date, 1, 4)="$year"
group by category
ORDER BY amount desc;
targets.rawQueryText:
SELECT
    v_categories.name as category,
    -sum(v_transactions.amount/100.0)  as amount
FROM 
    v_transactions
JOIN 
    v_categories 
ON 
    v_transactions.category = v_categories.id
WHERE account='46746a7c-0eff-4702-a081-5cef893afce9' AND is_income=0 AND category != '182c3391-7cb6-46a6-b382-0c58952bd354' AND category != 'cf607948-1034-412a-8a21-72a9dc761c5f' AND amount < 0 AND substr(date, 1, 4)="$year"
group by category
ORDER BY amount desc;

targets.queryText: select amount/100.0 as Gehalt from v_transactions where category='3c1699a5-522a-435e-86dc-93d900a14f0e' ORDER BY date DESC LIMIT 1;
targets.rawQueryText: select amount/100.0 as Gehalt from v_transactions where category='3c1699a5-522a-435e-86dc-93d900a14f0e' ORDER BY date DESC LIMIT 1;

targets.queryText: select amount/100.0 as Sparen from v_transactions where category='182c3391-7cb6-46a6-b382-0c58952bd354' ORDER BY date DESC LIMIT 1;
targets.rawQueryText: select amount/100.0 as Sparen from v_transactions where category='182c3391-7cb6-46a6-b382-0c58952bd354' ORDER BY date DESC LIMIT 1;

targets.queryText:
SELECT
    substr('JanFebMarAprMayJunJulAugSepOctNovDec', 1 + 3*substr(date, 5, 2), -3) || ' ' || substr(date, 3, 2) as Datum,
    -sum(v_transactions.amount/100.0)  as amount,
    accounts.name account, 
    v_categories.name as category,
    v_categories.is_income,
    v_transactions.notes,
    v_transactions.date
FROM 
    v_transactions
JOIN 
    v_categories 
ON 
    v_transactions.category = v_categories.id
JOIN 
    accounts
ON 
    v_transactions.account = accounts.id
WHERE account='485a9e8d-1476-4d31-b9c0-193443dc9978' AND is_income=0 AND category != '182c3391-7cb6-46a6-b382-0c58952bd354' AND category != '5d31f7ee-0b38-47f5-bbe0-416d8d468a60' AND substr(date, 1, 4)="$year"
group by category, Datum
ORDER BY date;
targets.rawQueryText:
SELECT
    substr('JanFebMarAprMayJunJulAugSepOctNovDec', 1 + 3*substr(date, 5, 2), -3) || ' ' || substr(date, 3, 2) as Datum,
    -sum(v_transactions.amount/100.0)  as amount,
    accounts.name account, 
    v_categories.name as category,
    v_categories.is_income,
    v_transactions.notes,
    v_transactions.date
FROM 
    v_transactions
JOIN 
    v_categories 
ON 
    v_transactions.category = v_categories.id
JOIN 
    accounts
ON 
    v_transactions.account = accounts.id
WHERE account='485a9e8d-1476-4d31-b9c0-193443dc9978' AND is_income=0 AND category != '182c3391-7cb6-46a6-b382-0c58952bd354' AND category != '5d31f7ee-0b38-47f5-bbe0-416d8d468a60' AND substr(date, 1, 4)="$year"
group by category, Datum
ORDER BY date;

targets.queryText:
SELECT
    substr('JanFebMarAprMayJunJulAugSepOctNovDec', 1 + 3*substr(date, 5, 2), -3) || ' ' || substr(date, 3, 2) as Datum,
    CASE 
        WHEN (SELECT amount/100.0 from v_transactions t2 where substr(t2.date, 1, 6)=substr(t1.date, 1, 6) and category='182c3391-7cb6-46a6-b382-0c58952bd354') IS NULL OR (SELECT amount/100.0 from v_transactions t2 where substr(t2.date, 1, 6)=substr(t1.date, 1, 6) and category='3c1699a5-522a-435e-86dc-93d900a14f0e') IS NULL THEN 0
        ELSE ROUND(((SELECT amount/100.0 from v_transactions t2 where substr(t2.date, 1, 6)=substr(t1.date, 1, 6) and category='182c3391-7cb6-46a6-b382-0c58952bd354') * 1.0) / (SELECT amount/100.0 from v_transactions t2 where substr(t2.date, 1, 6)=substr(t1.date, 1, 6) and category='3c1699a5-522a-435e-86dc-93d900a14f0e') * 100, 2)
    END as percentage
FROM v_transactions t1
WHERE substr(date, 1, 4) || substr(date, 5, 2) || substr(date, 7, 2) > substr(date('now','-6 months'), 1, 4) || substr(date('now','-6 months'), 6, 2) || substr(date('now','-6 months'), 9, 2)
GROUP BY Datum
ORDER BY date;
targets.rawQueryText:
SELECT
    substr('JanFebMarAprMayJunJulAugSepOctNovDec', 1 + 3*substr(date, 5, 2), -3) || ' ' || substr(date, 3, 2) as Datum,
    CASE 
        WHEN (SELECT amount/100.0 from v_transactions t2 where substr(t2.date, 1, 6)=substr(t1.date, 1, 6) and category='182c3391-7cb6-46a6-b382-0c58952bd354') IS NULL OR (SELECT amount/100.0 from v_transactions t2 where substr(t2.date, 1, 6)=substr(t1.date, 1, 6) and category='3c1699a5-522a-435e-86dc-93d900a14f0e') IS NULL THEN 0
        ELSE ROUND(((SELECT amount/100.0 from v_transactions t2 where substr(t2.date, 1, 6)=substr(t1.date, 1, 6) and category='182c3391-7cb6-46a6-b382-0c58952bd354') * 1.0) / (SELECT amount/100.0 from v_transactions t2 where substr(t2.date, 1, 6)=substr(t1.date, 1, 6) and category='3c1699a5-522a-435e-86dc-93d900a14f0e') * 100, 2)
    END as percentage
FROM v_transactions t1
WHERE substr(date, 1, 4) || substr(date, 5, 2) || substr(date, 7, 2) > substr(date('now','-6 months'), 1, 4) || substr(date('now','-6 months'), 6, 2) || substr(date('now','-6 months'), 9, 2)
GROUP BY Datum
ORDER BY date;

targets.queryText:
SELECT
    substr('JanFebMarAprMayJunJulAugSepOctNovDec', 1 + 3*substr(date, 5, 2), -3) || ' ' || substr(date, 3, 2) as Datum,
    -sum(amount/100.0) as amount
FROM 
    v_transactions
JOIN 
    v_categories 
ON 
    v_transactions.category = v_categories.id
WHERE account='485a9e8d-1476-4d31-b9c0-193443dc9978' AND is_income=0 AND category != '182c3391-7cb6-46a6-b382-0c58952bd354' AND category != '5d31f7ee-0b38-47f5-bbe0-416d8d468a60' AND substr(date, 1, 4) || substr(date, 5, 2) || substr(date, 7, 2) > substr(date('now','-12 months'), 1, 4) || substr(date('now','-12 months'), 6, 2) || substr(date('now','-12 months'), 9, 2)
group by Datum
ORDER BY date;
targets.rawQueryText:
SELECT
    substr('JanFebMarAprMayJunJulAugSepOctNovDec', 1 + 3*substr(date, 5, 2), -3) || ' ' || substr(date, 3, 2) as Datum,
    -sum(amount/100.0) as amount
FROM 
    v_transactions
JOIN 
    v_categories 
ON 
    v_transactions.category = v_categories.id
WHERE account='485a9e8d-1476-4d31-b9c0-193443dc9978' AND is_income=0 AND category != '182c3391-7cb6-46a6-b382-0c58952bd354' AND category != '5d31f7ee-0b38-47f5-bbe0-416d8d468a60' AND substr(date, 1, 4) || substr(date, 5, 2) || substr(date, 7, 2) > substr(date('now','-12 months'), 1, 4) || substr(date('now','-12 months'), 6, 2) || substr(date('now','-12 months'), 9, 2)
group by Datum
ORDER BY date;

targets.queryText:
SELECT 
  (SELECT SUM(amount/100.0) from v_transactions where account='33fba22d-2bca-4e2c-aacc-f11818b9fb8c' and substr(date, 1, 4)<="$year") as ETFs,
  (SELECT SUM(amount/100.0) from v_transactions where account='2b078462-c6fe-4fa3-9608-263f6bff40c2' and substr(date, 1, 4)<="$year") as bAV,
  (SELECT SUM(amount/100.0) from v_transactions where account in ('485a9e8d-1476-4d31-b9c0-193443dc9978','2fbd0039-a275-4836-85c3-583c41ec5b1b', 'd05e55b2-d75d-459a-b85f-a262e5d79a54', '6d86b807-ab3a-43d9-aeb6-82b34da41aeb', '52473ef9-5805-442a-9f71-0f676bcb5fd6') and substr(date, 1, 4)<="$year") as 'Tagesgeld/Festgeld/Cash'    
LIMIT 1;
targets.rawQueryText:
SELECT 
  (SELECT SUM(amount/100.0) from v_transactions where account='33fba22d-2bca-4e2c-aacc-f11818b9fb8c' and substr(date, 1, 4)<="$year") as ETFs,
  (SELECT SUM(amount/100.0) from v_transactions where account='2b078462-c6fe-4fa3-9608-263f6bff40c2' and substr(date, 1, 4)<="$year") as bAV,
  (SELECT SUM(amount/100.0) from v_transactions where account in ('485a9e8d-1476-4d31-b9c0-193443dc9978','2fbd0039-a275-4836-85c3-583c41ec5b1b', 'd05e55b2-d75d-459a-b85f-a262e5d79a54', '6d86b807-ab3a-43d9-aeb6-82b34da41aeb', '52473ef9-5805-442a-9f71-0f676bcb5fd6') and substr(date, 1, 4)<="$year") as 'Tagesgeld/Festgeld/Cash'    
LIMIT 1;

list.definition:
SELECT
    substr(date, 1, 4) as Datum
FROM v_transactions
GROUP BY Datum;
list.label: Jahr
list.name: year
list.query:
SELECT
    substr(date, 1, 4) as Datum
FROM v_transactions
GROUP BY Datum;
